results.description_highlighted: ...This is a Podcast series by Devansarma ji himself. A poet, spiritual leader & a social worker by deeds. He has been a dear one to a number of Siddhargal ( Siddhas ) at and around Madurai, Tiruvannamalai. Led by his Guru, Sadhguru Kanakkampatti Maha Sri Pazhani Swamy and Sri SivaPrabhakara Siddhayogi Paramahansar. Devansarmaji is a person who leads a simple life and believes in Dharmam. Devansarma ji started writing poems and scriptures in his young age, most of them being philosophy. He has been feeding thousands of humans & creatures for years now.
results.description_original: This is a Podcast series by Devansarma ji himself. A poet, spiritual leader & a social worker by deeds. He has been a dear one to a number of Siddhargal ( Siddhas ) at and around Madurai, Tiruvannamalai. Led by his Guru, Sadhguru Kanakkampatti Maha Sri Pazhani Swamy and Sri SivaPrabhakara Siddhayogi Paramahansar. Devansarmaji is a person who leads a simple life and believes in Dharmam. Devansarma ji started writing poems and scriptures in his young age, most of them being philosophy. He has been feeding thousands of humans & creatures for years now.

results.description_highlighted: ...He is remembered as one of the Kadai ēzhu vallal (literally meaning, the last seven great patrons) in Tamil literature.
results.description_original: Vēl paari was of a dynasty of Vēlir who ruled Parambu nādu under parkavakulam udayar clan and surrounding regions in ancient Tamilakam towards the end of the Sangam era. The name is often used to describe the most famous amongst them, who was the patron and friend of poet Kapilar and is extolled for his benevolence, patronage of art and literature. He is remembered as one of the Kadai ēzhu vallal (literally meaning, the last seven great patrons) in Tamil literature.
